Detailed Description

cvmx_mhbw::_mem_flip_synd0

These registers flip the ECC syndrome for internal MHBW memories to allow for testing of the ECC mechanisms.

Each internal memory has two consecutive bits. Setting one of the two bits will cause a single-bit error on the next access, and setting both bits will cause a double-bit error on the next access.
